paragraphs: Nestled between Dalyan and Ortaca in Okçular Village, our private detached house with an open-plan living area offers families a secluded holiday villa with a pool, immersed in nature for a peaceful getaway.

Feel at home in this accommodation, ideal for families with children and groups of friends. With a master bedroom, a children’s room, and a fully equipped kitchen, you can enjoy a comfortable vacation. The garden and pool are completely private, ensuring your full privacy.
Designed for vacationers; there is absolutely no outside interference in your private space. Perfect for honeymooners, nuclear families, and friend groups.

There is one double bed and two single beds; the sofas in the living room are also suitable for sleeping. The children’s room and open-plan kitchen living area offer pool views, while the double bedroom overlooks nature. One bathroom is available. No parking issues.

Fully equipped kitchen: all necessary appliances you may need (cutlery, plates, pots, serving dishes and glasses, etc.), refrigerator, oven, stove, kettle, toaster, washing machine, dishwasher, iron, ironing board, and vacuum cleaner.
Our villa features an 8×4 m pool with a depth of 1.55 m, including a children’s pool, outdoor shower, barbecue area, 4 sun loungers, and garden seating. There is also a swing in the garden.
All bedrooms have towels and blankets for the number of people. We recommend that you bring your own soap and shampoo for your hygiene.
You can place orders via major supermarket apps. Other necessities can be met in the Ortaca town center.
The garden and pool are cleaned meticulously after each customer.
